content: this flowery crochet placemat pattern has 3 sizes small medium and large so you can make your placemat or table mat any size you need *this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience * **difficulty ** easy/intermediate **materials needed ** 130-250 yards knit picks shine sport in white or yarn bee fresh haven in optic white 4 5mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet **additional terms ** 3dc cluster = dc3tog in same stitch cross stitch = skip st double_crochet in next st cross over st just made and double_crochet in skipped st cross stitch increase = double_crochet in next unworked st cross over st just made double_crochet in previous st st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces **gauge ** with 4 5mm hook just under 6 1/2 across after round 8 **measurements ** small 7 1/2 across medium 12 across large 16 1/4 across **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of round does not count as stitch -the directions for the placemats all start out the same but you will stop at certain rounds if you want a small medium or large placemat see the notes in the pattern on where to stop continue to the next round if you want the next size up
